samples.text: Didn't you know climate crisis has been canceled due to a Maga treatment! We're fine Sam!
Defunding the NWS takes MAGA climate denial to a whole new level

While Trump destroys economies, he's been signing orders to increase fossil fuel burning limits. He wants to scorch the earth as well. MAGA, are you feeling satiated now that your middle finger to Washington is doing everything you wanted? The entire world hates you, oh and most of your neighbors.

DeSatan ignores gun control as climate change. This is the price of living in MAGA denial. I’m sorry for all impacted, and the MAGA thoughts prayers may come if the scene passes a woke review of the crime scene if The Pulse is a guide from 2016. l.smartnews.comp-ko2iQwUfa...

A heroin addict environmental "lawyer" who doesn't know jack shit about science and medicine. I hope he overdoses on his drugs and this administration needs prosecuted for treason which is what all their actions are about. Fuck maga
So which one are you? A foreign troll or MAGA? Thanks for putting me on your bogus climate list. Idiot.
Maga denies vaccines, climate and science. They'd rather take advice from Joe Rogan

That's your perception and it says more about your narrow-minded view than it does about me. Maga doesn't complain about lacking environmental standards, or giving too much money to the rich. You're just lost.
Meanwhile, handing the election to MAGA COST lives elsewhere.
Need to work on communication... MAGA Cult only reads headlines, if anything. "Trump cuts staff and funding environmental research" or something
It's a good thing we got rid of all those govt climate science weirdos so we don't have to deal with that anymore...said every MAGAt today.

We now see MAGA means Muddling America’s Greatness Away. Trump's biggest strategic mistake - and biggest crime against humanity is to steal the world’s Climate Budget by pulling out of the Paris Agreement, isolating the US in a minority of one. It will bite him in the ass.

New theory - Trumpworld wants huge loses from severe weather - shuts down monitors and websites so 1000s die - they grab all the land for themselves. It’s not the craziest scheme they’ve come up with. MAGA bent over for the oligarchs and they’re about to get screwed

I get what you're saying. But MAGA almost always uses "follow the money" to reject an answer that makes logical sense e.g. passes Occam's Razor. Like in the case of climate change--instead of considering that 1000s of scientists might be on the right track, they say they're all in on a conspiracy.

For what it’s worth I very, very much doubt that a propensity to support MAGA is even a genetic one. Much more likely environmental ie upbringing. So utterly pointless and illogical taking my comment seriously. Getting rid of MAGA is regrettably not going to be easy.

We now see MAGA means Muddling America’s Greatness Away. Trump's biggest strategic mistake - and biggest crime against humanity is to steal the world’s Climate Budget by pulling out of the Paris Agreement, isolating the US in a minority of one. It will bite him in the ass.

MAGA will gleefully destroy environmental protections, pollute the earth, smog the sky, and they won't care, because their Reality is being a suit, participating in a social construction whereby rules and laws and etiquette are how they define perception.
Except maggots and bugs provide important environmental services.
More idiotic stuff from the MAGA clowns. You can ignore climate change but it will not ignore you!
This is a beautiful thing to do. It also showed the number of people who transition won’t impact anyone. That includes MAGA.
